tool.name: Merge Transfrags
tool.command: #set $fasta_files = list() #for $fileone in $fastaFiles: ln -sf $fileone.Fasta $fileone.Fasta'.fa'; $fasta_files.append(str($fileone.Fasta)+'.fa') #end for #set fasta_files=" ".join(fasta_files) mkdir -p ${__tool_directory__}/$$/ && cat $fasta_files > ${__tool_directory__}/$$/tmp.fasta && /home/galaxy/miniconda3/envs/bio/bin/cd-hit-est -i ${__tool_directory__}/$$/tmp.fasta -o ${__tool_directory__}/$$/tmp.cd-hit.fasta -c $sequence_identity_threshold -T $thread -n $word_length -d 0 -aS $aS_value -aL $aL_value -r 0 -M 3000 && /bin/bash ${__tool_directory__}/01_convert_standard_fa.sh ${__tool_directory__}/$$/tmp.cd-hit.fasta ${__tool_directory__}/$$/tmp.final.fasta && /home/galaxy/miniconda3/envs/bio/bin/python ${__tool_directory__}/01_rename_fasta_id.py ${__tool_directory__}/$$/tmp.final.fasta ${__tool_directory__}/$$/tmp.result.fasta && mv ${__tool_directory__}/$$/tmp.result.fasta $fastq0 && rm -rf ${__tool_directory__}/$$/

param.name: sequence_identity_threshold
param.label: Sequence identity threshold
param.help: sequence identity threshold (default: 0.9),this is the default cd-hit's global sequence identity calculated as: number of identical amino acids or bases in alignment divided by the full length of the shorter sequence

param.name: aL_value
param.label: Alignment coverage for the longer sequence
param.help: if set to 0.9, the alignment must covers 90% of the sequence.

param.name: aS_value
param.label: Alignment coverage for the shorter sequence
param.help: if set to 0.9, the alignment must covers 90% of the sequence.

param.name: thread
param.label: Threads
param.help: The number of threads used for parallel computation.

exit_code.description: Error Running combine collection to a file

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
In this function, a novel program CD-HIT (Fu *et al*., 2012) for clustering biological sequences to reduce sequence redundancy and improve the performance of other sequence analyses.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs**
- **Input FASTA files:** Input assembled transcript fragments(transfrags) in FASTA format
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Parameters**
- **Sequence identity threshold:** Tthis is the default cd-hit's global sequence identity calculated as: number of identical amino acids or bases in alignment divided by the full length of the shorter sequence. - **Word length:** word_length (default 5). - **Alignment coverage for the longer sequence:** if set to 0.9, the alignment must covers 90% of the sequence (default 0.0). - **Alignment coverage for the shorter sequence:** if set to 0.9, the alignment must covers 90% of the sequence (default 0.9).
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Outputs**
- **Transfrags after deduplication in FASTA format**
